name: power
comment: High-voltage AC bus collecting renewable generation and exports to downstream conversion equipment.

name: ammonia
comment: Terminal bus representing ammonia product; sized implicitly via loads and link conversions.

name: power_storage
comment: Buffer bus for the battery interface links.

name: hydrogen
comment: Intermediate hydrogen stream between electrolysis and synthesis.

name: ramp_penalty
comment: Virtual bus for enforcing ramp penalties on the Haber-Bosch unit.
